message:
Californians would be able to register online to vote under a bill introduced Wednesday by state Sen.

"Weir said the DMV signature is key. People going to the DMV for the first time must produce an identifying document--a birth certificate or some naturalization documentation, for example--whereas standard voter registration cards aren't checked against citizenship or identifying documents."

http://www.mercurynews.com/breaking-news/ci_17404559?nclick_check=1
And suddenly ALL the States seem to be moving toward REQUIRING voters to show State-issued (read: motor vehicle department) IDs in order to vote...
